entity.name: Portify Development Team
entity.description: We're an open-source development team creating Portify - a universal product migration platform that helps digital creators migrate their products between any e-commerce platforms with 99% success rate. Our mission is to eliminate vendor lock-in and empower creators with platform freedom.

projects.name: Portify - Universal Product Migration Platform
projects.description: Open-source automation platform for migrating digital products between any e-commerce platforms with 99% success rate. Features AI-powered content optimization, plugin architecture for unlimited platform support, and real-time migration monitoring. Currently supports 5 major platforms with 25+ planned.

channels.description: Direct bank transfer for grant funding. Please contact us via email for banking details.
PayPal for smaller donations and community support.

plans.name: Platform Development Grant
plans.description: Fund the development of 20+ major e-commerce platform integrations, infrastructure scaling for 10,000+ concurrent migrations, and community building with multi-language documentation and 24/7 support.

plans.name: Infrastructure Support
plans.description: Monthly support for server costs, API access, and infrastructure scaling to handle growing user base.

plans.name: Community Support
plans.description: Any amount to support the open-source community and ongoing development.

history.description: Bootstrap development with personal funds for hosting and development tools.
